page.title: 01Rhynie Dustrict In 1985
page.content: The area's centre is Rhynie vilage which for many centuries was an important agricultural centre. The area is soaked in former glories and history eg Mackay of Uganda, Anderson Bay, Fortified Fort. Housing is a mixture of substantial private and local authority. The size and high maintainance of the gardens immediately strikes the eye. Next year a sheltered housing complex of fourteen units will be opened. Employment is a mixture of small family businesses and employment opportunities outside the area. Very few are involved in the "Oil Industry". There is virtually no long term unemployment in the area. Entertainment is centred around the two school halls and during the winter months there is a wide variety of activities available such as bowling.
